title: Conversion Rate Analysis
insights:
Analysis of Bus Ticket Booking App Dataset

This analysis covers the conversion metrics and performance of the bus ticket booking app based on the dataset provided. The focus is on conversion health, payment failure analysis, push notification ROI, and actionable conversion tactics.

1. CONVERSION HEALTH

The overall conversion rate for the app is 1.8%, which is below the typical industry benchmark of 2-5%. This indicates that the app is not performing well in converting users into paying customers.

Comparing the two time periods:

  • First Half (24-Dec to 06-Jan): 1.74%
  • Second Half (06-Jan to 20-Jan): 2.01%

While there is a slight improvement in the second half, the overall conversion rate remains below the industry standard.

2. PAYMENT FAILURE ANALYSIS

The payment success rate is 25.0%, which is significantly below the acceptable threshold of 80% for a reliable payment flow. This suggests major issues within the payment process.

Payment failure events include:

  • Total payment attempts: 36
  • Payment failures: 17
  • Payment failure rate: 47.22%

Possible causes for these failures could include technical issues during the payment process, user interface problems, or lack of payment options.

3. PUSH NOTIFICATION ROI

Currently, there are 0 push users, resulting in a push conversion rate of 0%. This indicates that push notifications are not being utilized to drive conversions, and there is no comparison available with organic users.

4. CONVERSION TACTICS

To improve conversion rates, the following specific, implementable changes are recommended:

  • Enhance Payment Flow: Streamline the payment process by reducing the number of steps and ensuring multiple payment options. Expected impact: Increase payment success rate to at least 70%, improving overall conversion rate to approximately 3.5%.
  • Implement Push Notifications: Start utilizing push notifications to re-engage users who abandon the app during the booking process. Expected impact: Achieve a push conversion rate of 5% among push users, potentially increasing overall conversions by 0.5%.
  • Address User Interface Issues: Conduct user testing to identify and fix UI/UX issues that may hinder the booking process. Expected impact: Improve user satisfaction and reduce payment failures by 20%, leading to an increase in payment success rate to 50%.
